verses.verse: A Song <WH7892> of degrees. <WH4609> Many a time <WH7227> have they afflicted <WH6887> me from my youth, <WH4480> <WH5271> may Israel <WH3478> now <WH4994> say: <WH559>
Many a time <WH7227> have they afflicted <WH6887> me from my youth: <WH4480> <WH5271> yet <WH1571> they have not <WH3808> prevailed <WH3201> against me.
The plowers <WH2790> plowed <WH2790> upon <WH5921> my back: <WH1354> they made long <WH748> their furrows. <WH4618>
The LORD <WH3068> is righteous: <WH6662> he hath cut asunder <WH7112> the cords <WH5688> of the wicked. <WH7563>
Let them all <WH3605> be confounded <WH954> and turned <WH5472> back <WH268> that hate <WH8130> Zion. <WH6726>
Let them be <WH1961> as the grass <WH2682> upon the housetops, <WH1406> which withereth <WH3001> before <WH7945> <WH6927> it groweth up: <WH8025>
Wherewith the mower <WH7114> filleth <WH4390> not <WH7945> <WH3808> his hand; <WH3709> nor he that bindeth <WH6014> sheaves his bosom. <WH2683>
Neither <WH3808> do they which go by <WH5674> say, <WH559> The blessing <WH1293> of the LORD <WH3068> be upon <WH413> you: we bless <WH1288> you in the name <WH8034> of the LORD. <WH3068>
